listing_by_id.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'callflow' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'numbers': doc.numbers}); }

listing_by_number.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'callflow' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; for (var i in doc.numbers) emit(doc.numbers[i], {'id': doc._id}); }
